title: proximityPrompt​
content: </> Input.proximityPrompt: ProximityPrompt  The ProximityPrompt created with Input.new.

title: key​
content: </> Input.key: Enum.KeyCode The Enum.KeyCode given with Input.new.

title: beganCallback​
content: </> Input.beganCallback: (Player | nil) → () The callback set with Input:onBegan.

title: beganConnection​
content: </> Input.beganConnection: RBXScriptConnection  The connection created in Input:onBegan.

title: endCallback​
content: </> Input.endCallback: (Player | nil) → () The callback set with Input:onEnd.

title: endConnection​
content: </> Input.endConnection: RBXScriptConnection  The connection created in Input:onEnd.

title: new​
content: </> Input.new(key: Enum.KeyCode) → Input Creates an input object with the specified Enum.KeyCode.

title: onBegan​
content: </> Input:onBegan(callback: callback) → Input Sets the callback to be ran when the input key is pressed.

title: onEnd​
content: </> Input:onEnd(callback: callback) → Input Sets the callback to be ran when the input key is let go.

title: setTimeout​
content: </> Input:setTimeout(amount: number) → Input Sets a timeout in between key presses for Input:onBegan.

title: disconnect​
content: </> Input:disconnect(type: Enum.UserInputState) → Input Disconnects either of the input connections created with Input:onBegan or Input:onEnd depending on the type argument.

title: reconnect​
content: </> Input:reconnect(type: Enum.UserInputState) → Input Reconnects either of the input connections created with Input:onBegan or Input:onEnd depending on the type argument.
